title: ChartView
description: Chart view used in ChartContent and ObjectHeaderChart.

ChartHeight.description: Provide chart height in dp. Only for android.

SeriesColor.description: Each string must represent hex-code of color. iOS only, it is not configurable in Android.

Data.description: Data contains the values for each series. It expect an array that contains integer arrays. Each array element represents data for a series.

NoDataText.description: Placeholder text when chart data is not available. If this is absent, no text will be displayed when chart data is empty.

TrendItems.description: Can be used to display trends of data. This is only for iOS and only when the chart content is interactive.

TrendTitle.description: This is only for iOS, not supported in Android.

TrendImage.description: This is only for iOS, not supported in Android.
